product_name: REI Tech Beast Wheeled Duffel - 32" - Special Buy
long_description: The REI Tech Beast Wheeled Duffel 32" is built for the long haul and designed to keep you organized, and your travel simplified. High-performance components, tough fabric and thoughtful design elements are blended into a small profile and targeted for space-constrained travelers. Rugged telescopic pull handle locks in up or down position; a soft-touch handle grip ensures comfort and control through the twists and turns of travel. Rugged wheels and housings provide durability and smooth rolling for the long haul. Interior frame provides structure and upright stability for transport ease. Full zippered panel-opening main compartment offers easy access. Lower front pocket has an internal expansion zipper to provide extra storage for laundry bag or shoe/boot storage. Fully lined interior features 2 compression straps and 2 side zippered mesh pockets for organization. Zippered front pocket allows quick stashing of last-minute items such as toothbrush or journal. Top and side grab handles make handling a breeze. REI Tech Beast Wheeled Duffel 32" is constructed of abrasion-, moisture- and tear-resistant ballistic nylon for exceptional durability. Special Buy.
short_description: The REI Tech Beast Wheeled Duffel 32" is built for the long haul and designed to keep you organized, and your travel simplified.
